body.description: 150-300 word document section containing content in HTML format.
body.title: Document Section Body

title.description: Heading title used for this document section.
title.title: Title of Document Section

transcript.description: Text that will be used to generate the audio file
transcript.title: Transcript

prompt.description: Prompt context for creating doc - will be shown later in document UI.
prompt.title: Prompt

prompt.description: Prompt context for creating spreadsheet - will be shown later in document UI.
prompt.title: Prompt

sheets.description: List of sheets inside spreadsheet. Each sheet consists of a header row, followed by rows of data
sheets.title: Sheets

title.description: Mandatory: the title of the spreadsheet. Must be included.
title.title: Title

content.description: Sheet data content in CSV format. Enclose all fields in double quotes.
content.title: Content

prompt.description: Prompt used to describe the doc creation request. IT IS NOT USED TO CREATE DOC, only to display in UI for user to view later.
prompt.title: Prompt

resume_content.description: Resume content in Markdown format. Do NOT include any of the above information (name, email, phone, location, website url) here; they should be directly placed via their respective fields. When using acronyms, ensure to write out the full term as well. For example, instead of writing 'SEO', write 'Search Engine Optimization (SEO)'.
resume_content.title: Resume Content

resume_field_email.description: Optional: Personal email to be placed directly into the resume/cv. If supplied, do NOT include it in the formatted_markdown field.
resume_field_email.title: Resume Field Email

resume_field_location.description: Optional: Location to be placed directly into the resume/cv. If supplied, do NOT include it in the formatted_markdown field.
resume_field_location.title: Resume Field Location

resume_field_name.description: Mandatory: Personal name to be placed directly into the resume/cv. Do NOT include it in the formatted_markdown field.
resume_field_name.title: Resume Field Name

resume_field_phone.description: Optional: Phone number to be placed directly into the resume/cv. If supplied, do NOT include it in the formatted_markdown field.
resume_field_phone.title: Resume Field Phone

resume_field_website_url.description: Optional: Website URL to be placed directly into the resume/cv. If supplied, do NOT include it in the formatted_markdown field.
resume_field_website_url.title: Resume Field Website Url

intro_slide.description: The first slide in the deck - IT SHOULD ONLY HAVE A TITLE AND NO CONTENT
intro_slide.title: Intro Slide

prompt.description: Prompt context for creating doc - will be shown later in document UI.
prompt.title: Prompt

slides.description: List of slides following the intro slide. Each slide should only have 2 string params: `title` and `content`. Content is a single string (DO NOT INPUT AS A LIST).
slides.title: Slides

f1_http_url.description: User will pass a HTTPS or HTTP url to a file so that the file contents can be read.
f1_http_url.title: F1 Http Url

f2_query.description: User will pass a query string to fetch relevant sections from the contents. It will be used for sentence-level similarity search on the document based on embeddings.
f2_query.title: F2 Query

f3_selected_pages.description: Filter document on these page numbers. Use empty list to get all pages.
f3_selected_pages.title: F3 Selected Pages

title.description: The title of the slide. Must be included.
title.title: Title

content.description: The string content for this slide. DO NOT INPUT AS A LIST. Must contain ALL the text that will go on the slide. Use '\n' characters for formatting.
content.title: Content

title.description: The title of the slide. Must be included.
title.title: Title

info.description: A GPT that allows the user to create a document exportable as a PDF or DOCX file.
info.title: Doc Maker GPT

post.summary: Create an audio file that can be downloaded via URL

post.description: Create a new presentation by directly providing the content.
post.summary: Create a new presentation directly with content

post.description: Create a new spreadsheet given data. Enclose all fields in double quotes.
Append a new document subsection for a multi-page document, with title and body. Default at least 150-300 words.
post.summary: Append a new document subsection for a multi-page document.

post.description: Create a new empty multi-page document. Always follow up with function call `multipage_add_subsection_to_document`.
post.summary: Create a new empty multi-page document

post.description: Allows for reading the contents of an URL link, including PDF/DOC/DOCX/PPT/CSV/XLS/XLSX/HTML content, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, aidocmaker.com docs. Always wrap image URLs from the response field `z1_image_urls` in Markdown, where each image has a ## DESCRIPTION.
post.summary: Read the contents of an URL link

post.description: Create a simple document, with formatted Markdown content in the field `formatted_markdown`. Include prompt text used in the field `prompt`.
